snippet: Fernando Verdasco of Spain won the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston for his first ATP Tour title since 2010, beating his countryman Nicolás Almagro, 6-3, 7-6 (4).
abstract: Fernando Verdasco of Spain beats countryman Nicolas Almagro to win the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Fernando Verdasco of Spain won the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston for his first ATP Tour title since 2010, beating his countryman Nicolás Almagro, 6-3, 7-6 (4).
